title: Could a salmon get a treatment?
body:
You know, when you compare these two skins, Diana looks way more fireish than Zyra, which looks like a salmon with this colour ._. Would a little colour tweak be possible? I don't play this skin at all because of it and how it doesn't fit the Summoners Rift...

http://i.imgur.com/zn0nTpd.jpg

Edit: Guys seriously, where did I call for adding fire effects? :D I asked for COLOUR TWEAK, because she looks like a SALMON. Get it finally? :D Thank you.

replies.body: As you can see Diana is way hotter ;)
{{champion:89}} "Welcome back sister."
Leona and Diana are **not** sisters.

> [{quoted}](name=JIIMIE,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=395GaOjK,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-10-21T02:56:05.714+0000)
>
> Leona and Diana are **not** sisters.

I dont think he's calling her a blood sister lols
You might be right. But some people get them mixed up with Kayle and Morgana.
OH WOW WOW TAKE A STEP BACK PLEASE THERE'S A MONSTER NONE OF US WANTS TO WAKE

Like a sun
Right between the religion.
Petition to turn the tables and make fireZyra blue.
I approve of this message.

how about zyra in a samus suit ? ;3

totaly not stolen from your name {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Honestly I think they should not give more fire-particles to Zyra,mainly because the 2 skins look already pretty similar and adding fire effects to Zyra would make them even more similar.

Gosh what a great idea!
Lets make a wildfire skin but make it have _nothing_ to do with fire or have any fire particles of any kind whatsoever!
Well she has some fire already on her(not much,but a bit around the hands),I'm not saying they should remove fire from her,just thatt they might not want to add more to it.
Maybe they could darken the red on Zyra a bit and give her lava or magma-like particles instead of fire to differentiate between the skins.
Yeah I'd say that would actually be a better solution(and not really unfitting since Zyra has already some lava-particles)
The OP isn't asking for more fire particles.  He's just asking for a recoloring of her towards those fiery colors rather than her pinkish salmon color.
But making the color scheme more similar would result in the same problem
Summoner name checks out.

Should've gotten a texture update when they did the base skin. I hate how her top half gets all blurry and redish instead of black like the splash art shows it to be. You can't even tell she has headgear because it's all just this orange mess.
I think they tried to make her look like a flame atronach from the elder scrolls.
Entirely true. And that thing is orange, not salmon.

Speaking of Elder Scrolls, 

Upvote if you're stoked for ESV Special Edition coming out October 28th!!  :D
I WANT ZYRA SKINS.
Well even Karthus' getting one now ._.
I'd be worried about problems with recognizing which is which if they both were the same colors.

You wouldn't because you don't see Zyra ever in games lol

Now srsly; I'm pretty sure there are already skins you have troubles diferentiating in the heat of the game and which are way more likely to occur in one game, l.n. SG Lux, Janna and Jinx
But the star guardian skins all have very distinct colors with very different base models.

But still in the heat of the battle they might be mistaken for each other, but I maybe could use better example (and clearly many people love those skins lol). What about Cottontail skins ot Battlecast Cho and Skarner?

Not really, none of the star guardian skins look remotely alike, and even their particle effects are quite distinct. 

Cottontail teemo and fizz look entirely different. As do battlecast chogath and skarner.
Well I could say the same about Dia and Zyra, those are completely personal opinions... If anyone can notice that Fizz's face is blue, then they should be able to notice Diana's sword.
But it's not the same thing at all. You want the same color pallet when they already have a very similar model. Fizz's model is completely different than Teemos.
Her splash art is so pwetty ;w;

ALSO CAN THE FIRE SEEDS AND GRAVESTONE SEEDS CREATED WITH W PLEASE NOT BE PURPLE?!?!?

LOUD NOISES

Zyra hasn't gotten a skin in over 3 years, you think they care about the poor plant lady enough to touch her up even?

Come on man, Riot clearly just hates Zyra.
She has had the least appearance work put into her since release even.

Not that I wouldn't love some Zyra love myself, just that is doesn't seem like it's ever gonna happen cause Riot just hates the plant lady for whatever reason.

She was in A New Dawn

Not a lot of champs can say that
To be fair, neither was zed, and the meme goes that riot is a bunch of zed mains.

zed got a championship skin
so shush, zed has plenty of decent skins now

while zyra has 3 -> haunted/fire/skt

1. Her kill was stolen
2. They killed her as soon as she appeared.

They hate her indeed.

Diana more strong then Zyra because Diana have QWER = fast SLAIN  i was test Diana and Zyra : DIANA the best .
hope that helpful{{champion:131}}

Diana useless when behind, Zyra CC and vision and many zone  control
Zyra also fast slain and RANGED dps
Zyra plant
Zyra > Diana

Let me walk you through Riot's process.

1) Does the issue involve skins?

> Yes: direct issue to skins team for rapid response, proceed to question 2
> No: direct issue to other team for sluggish, nonsensical response

2) Does the issue involve Zyra?

> Yes: what's a zyra?
> No: resolve issue in a promp and satisfactory manner
Yes please! I love this Zyra skin. could do with some love. Actually . . . we need a new Zyra skin now that I think about it.
SHUT UP, SALMON {{champion:143}} IS BAE.
! >:CCC I own all skins and I play basic after the update because it's just the prettiest
i always have trouble with recognising diana with this skin, it doesn't even looks like her
Scrap the skin edit, give us a new skin please.
Thb I gave up on that, so I only ask for one of the existing skins being playable.

Maybe instead of adding fire effects (which some say would make her look too similar to Infernal Diana), deepen her base color and add darker pinks and reds to contour and highlight her body vines with maybe like a watery fire effect across her head plant thing rather than a gaseous fire effect such as Diana's.
ehh its a dicy situation because then they would have to give more fire effects for other fire themed skins (wukong, ww)
